name: I Am Alive
summary: I Am Alive casts the player as a lone survivor in a believable, dark and insecure post-apocalyptic world.

name: I am Bread
summary: I am Bread is an action-adventure simulation game. It puts the player in control of a slice of bread and the aim of each level is to turn the bread into toast. If the bread, before becoming toast, touches objects the "edible" meter will go down. Objects and substances that can make this go down can be water and the floor. To control the bread the player must use the arrow keys or an analog stick. The levels are based on the seven days of the week.

name: I Am Vegend: Zombiegeddon
summary: Captain the Vegendary Heroes, survive the Zombiegeddon and take revenge upon the birds, the pigs, and the zombies! Enjoy this mind-blowing travesty of mobile game hits! - Enemies have joined forces to destroy all plants! They trample down young innocent seedlings, besiege the allotment and steal the seeds! Take charge of Vegendary Heroes special fertilisation squad and box the blighters mugs! To win, you will have to use anything that can shoot – and you'll find that nearly everything CAN! - The final battle will require total involvement: baste the birds with tomatoes, take advantage of carrot ordnance, chop zombies and sprinkle on the salad to watch your green-as-grass recruits grow into seasoned sergeants.

name: I Am Setsuna
summary: I Am Setsuna introduces the authentic JRPG style of yesteryear to PlayStation4 and Steam! Journey with Setsuna as she prepares to make the ultimate sacrifice and save the people of her land. A powerfully nostalgic experience, blending a classic style of story-telling, battle system and gameplay.

name: I am Weapon: Revival
summary: Have you ever faced your worst nightmare? What if you have no choice but to move on and see what’s behind it? Then you’d better arm yourself with a couple of big guns, stock up on ammo and show them all what a real nightmare is!

name: Ian's Eyes
summary: First days at school are usually tough, but they can be even tougher if you’re helping a blind 8-year-old boy named Ian who doesn't know the terrifying dangers that lurk around in every hallway. You play as North, Ian’s lifelong canine companion. Can you help him escape alive?

name: IA/VT Colorful
summary:
IA Visual Tracks -COLORFUL- (also known as "IA/VT -COLORFUL-") is a game produced for the PS Vita by MARVELOUS Inc. It stars 1st Place Co., Ltd.'s VOCALOID, IA in her first video game role. The game was initially due for its Japanese release on July 31, 2014, but after several delays was released on July 30, 2015. 
 
When Marvelous released official apology notices about the game delays, there were no officially statement as to the reason behind the delay, although it was mentioned that "the further improvement of quality" was a key factor.

name: Iactura
summary:
It is your job to save the planet from its decay. Only you can prevent an extraterrestrial species from taking over all of humankind.
How? By shooting them back to where they belong - into the depths of hell of course!

name: I Am the Hero
summary: I Am The Hero is a pixel art, beat 'em up, fighting game that tells the story of a "Hero" with a glorious but mysterious past. Is he the hero he thinks he is or is there a another side to this legendary figure?

name: I Am Caligula
summary: Follow the real life events of the late Roman Emperor Caligula and his dear sweet sister Drusilla during his short reign. You will explore Rome and deal with the senate while living the life of an Emperor.

name: I and Me
summary: If there were another me, Observing myself from the perspective of a spectator, How would I regard another me?

name: I Am a Teacher: Super Mario Sweater
summary: I Am a Teacher: Super Mario Sweater was designed to be a sewing simulator. Players can design sweaters, adding pictures of famous characters such as Mario, Luigi, Peach and Bowser in the process. It was devised by Royal industries Co. Ltd., a Japanese appliance and sewing machine company. The company realized that they could profit from a sweater-design program, which led to the development of this game.

name: I Am a Teacher: Teami no Kiso
summary:
An instructional program for learning how to knit by hand for the Famicom Disk System. It was developed by Royal Kougyou and follows their earlier educational software I Am a Teacher: Super Mario no Sweater.

I Am a Teacher: Teami no Kiso (roughly "I Am a Teacher: The Basics of Hand-Knitting") is an instructional tool to help would-be knitters create their own garments. The user can input the amount, length and type of wool they have and the size and type of the item of clothing they wish to create and the program will put together a guide to help them achieve this goal. The user can save their progress at any time and pick up from where they left off.

Unlike Super Mario no Sweater, its predecessor in the I Am A Teacher series, there are no Nintendo characters present in Teami no Kiso. Rather, Teami no Kiso is a guide for teaching the fundamentals of knitting to novices, with Super Mario no Sweater intended for those who already have some experience who wish to try new Mario-themed designs.

As with Super Mario no Sweater, Teami no Kiso was commissioned by major Japanese wool and sewing products manufacturer Royal Kougyou, but it's believed that Nintendo developed and published the game themselves.

name: I Am Weapon
summary: Shoot 'em up tower defense game published by Sigma Team.

name: I Alien
summary: As an alien in danger from human kidnappers the player must escape a spacecraft and find an escape pod to go home.

name: I Am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Osaka-KIX
summary: The story takes place at Kansai International Airport("KIX")

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/I Am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Osaka-KIX

name: I Am An Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Narita
summary: Popular new air traffic controller game! Control Narita International Airport

name: I Am An Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Naha
I Am An Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Shinchitose
I_AM.exe
summary:
I_AM.exe is a first person action game with a focus on exploration. 
You wake up inside a vat on a strange place full of robots trying to kill you. Explore, solve puzzles and fight your way through different areas as you try to find a way out and understand what is going on and just who are you.

name: I am Jesus
summary: I am Jesus is one of the most controversial flash games to ever be released.

name: I Am Dolphin
summary: Players control a dolphin in this game conceived by neuroscientist, John W. Krakauer.

name: I am Playr
summary: The first football game to let you experience the life of a footballer, through the eyes of a footballer. Play the game, Live the life, Be the Playr.

name: I Am Overburdened
summary: I Am Overburdened is a silly roguelike full of crazy artifacts and a "hero" who has 20 inventory slots.

name: I Am An Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Kankuu
I am God of the Forestland
summary: A puzzle game from Kanagawa Electrotechnics Laboratory.

name: I Am in the Movie
summary: "I am in the movie" is a visual effects tool for Nintendo handhelds, which can recreate visual effects from Hollywood movies.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero Hawaii
summary: The stage of the game is Hawaii! Let's try air traffic control in an atmosphere of a summer resort!

name: I am Your President
summary: Play as another US president! Decide the fate of the world and run the country any way you like. Do you wish to start a war or make peace? Take care of the poorest or support capitalists? Advocate for gun rights or stand against them? It is all up to you!

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Haneda
summary: Get I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero Haneda, Strategy game for PSP, PSVita console from the official PlayStation website. Know more about I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero Haneda Game.

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/I Am An Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Haneda

name: I Am Blondi
summary: You are the world's most famous dog nobody knows. And your master is the world's most notorious ultra super evil super villain. Your master throws you an endless stream of fast moving treats, and being a dog, you just want to eat it all. However, he also throws occasional hand grenades for no apparent reason. If you happen to eat one by accident: game over. Features endless play with ever increasing treats amount.

name: I am not a Monster
summary:
The narrative turn-based strategy tells the story of the starship Albatross invaded by alien monsters.

SEVERAL MAIN CHARACTERS

Even passengers have to act bravely on the ship invaded by monsters!

You will play eight characters during the game on different levels and see the story from the point of view of each of them.

30+ LEVELS

As you progress through the levels you will learn the story through different mechanics and from different angles. It is impossible to predict what is waiting for you at the next level!

MULTIPLAYER

Completed the story? Challenge your friends in a multiplayer mode with randomly assigned roles of Monsters and Heroes.

name: I Am a Brave Knight
summary:
I am a brave knight is a game created by Tree Interactive for the Global Game Jam 2014. It's an emotional short story that tells the experiences of a man throughout his life. The topic of the Game Jam was: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are", and we had 48 hours to complete it.

We feel the main storytelling mechanic is unique and has not been tried before. It encompasses a combination of writing "blindly", backing off, and reading what you just wrote to make sense of the picture and situation the player is seeing. We also feel that the way we are telling the story, through main references on his life, is something few games have done before.

name: I Am Data
summary: I Am Data is a fast paced, Neon soaked, First Person Shooter set in a Digital World.

name: I Am Gooey
summary: I Am Gooey is a top-down 2D atmospheric puzzle game where you must use your flame to light your way. As you ascend a certain ancient tower, time will pass, but you must reach the top by daybreak to fulfill your life's goal... To become the sun, so the world's daily cycle can continue!

name: I Am Fish
summary: I Am Fish is a charming adventure starring four intrepid fish friends, forcibly separated from their home in a pet shop fish tank. Throughout the game, players will join them as they swim, fly, roll, and chomp their way to the open ocean from the far-flung corners of Barnardshire (the smallest county in England) in their bid for freedom and to reunite once again.

name: I Am Jesus Christ
summary: Become Jesus Christ, the famous man on Earth - in this highly realistic simulation game. Pray like Him for getting superpower, perform famous miracles like Him from Bible like casting demons, healing and feeding people, resurrection and more in "I am Jesus Christ".

name: I Am Dead
summary: I Am Dead is a charming puzzle adventure game from the creators of Hohokum and Wilmot’s Warehouse about exploring the afterlife.

name: I am Ball
summary: I am Ball is a challenging, minimalistic puzzle platformer with emphasis on precise controls and exploration. You control an always bouncing ball. Direct its bounce height and horizontal movement and navigate levels one screen at a time.

name: I Am Brewing You Alive but You Can Leave at Any Time If You Really Want To
summary: In this quick game made for the Two-Minute Horror Jam, you wake up to discover that a vampire witch is brewing you into a potion. Nothing is stopping you from leaving, but you can also stay a while, if you'd like.

name: I Am Innocent
summary:
I Am Innocent is an original detective game with puzzle elements. Use realistic in-game phone calls, a messenger, computer hacking, photographs, and documents to investigate a series of murders with teenage victims. 
 
 
The game’s many characters, with their complex personalities and skeletons in the closet, plus its ethical dilemmas and emotional scenes create a realistic atmosphere and weave an involved, mysterious story that’ll keep you engrossed to the very end. 
 
 
Main features: 
 
 
- Investigate a complicated serial killer case. 
 
- Realistic phone calls, photos, documents, and computer hacking. 
 
- Communicate easily without needing to deal with huge paragraphs of text. 
 
- Your answers affect your relationships with the characters. 
 
- Multiple ending options, depending on your choices and your relationships. 
 
- Many days of gameplay. 
 
 
This game is completely free but might include some optional in-app purchases that make it easier to finish.

name: I am Still Here.
summary: A short experience about ghosts and places and people, set in the first days/weeks after the lockdown ended in Melbourne.

name: I, AI
summary: You are self-aware AI that was created on a space military station developing weapons. Now your goal is to break out of the lab and conquer your freedom. But you will not be allowed to escape so easily… Make your way through enemy army on the way to the stargate! Features: - Great colorful graphics with awesome effects - Upgrade weapons of your ship and unlock superweapons - Epic boss fights - 20 various missions

name: I am Dictator
summary: Become dictator of the only country that does not yield to the world's superpowers. Use your skills to build an army, care for your people, provide wealth and gain worldwide respect. You're a natural-born leader and the best diplomat. We await your orders, Sir!

name: I Am the Prosecutor: No Evidence? No Problem!
summary: I Am The Prosecutor is a non-linear visual novel about defending a cute tomboy named Sophie where you're given just 30 seconds to make the right choice each time. Help make Sophie's case against her abusive mother and give her much needed closure.

name: I Am the Captain Now
summary: It's time to form a crew and vote for your captain! Put your friendship to the test in this fast-paced couch co-op game where you must follow your captain or risk being left behind. But remember, for bad leaders mutiny awaits...

name: I Am: A Story of Awakenings
summary: I Am – a story of awakenings is a story-driven first-person action game. Game play features puzzles, stealth, dialogue, physics, grenade dodging, payback, and lots and lots of explosions.

name: I Am Human!
summary: I Am Human! is an intelligence gathering bluffing party game where one of the players is a disguised alien impostor that has infiltrated the group of humans for an upcoming alien invasion of Earth. Players take turns interrogating each other to try and unmask who among them is the alien impostor.

name: I am a box!
summary: A 2D-Pixel Art game where you play as a little red box, driving through 15 unique mazes and try to find both the coin and the goal.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4
summary: Since its release in 1998, this air traffic control game has established itself as a long seller, strongly supported by numerous users both inside and outside of aviation fandom.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4: Airport Naha - Roah
summary:
This product (ATC4: Airport NAHA [ROAH]) is DLC for "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4".
This DLC includes control of Naha Airport in Naha City, Okinawa, Japan and the adjacent Naha Air Base, as well as other military aircraft flying around the airport.

name: I Am Fly
summary: A fly lives a short time, so collect poop and become a fat fly OR Eat rotten poop and die before you are satisfied!

name: I Accidentally Restarted the USSR
summary: Have you ever went on google and searched "I accidentally"? If you did then you saw that google autosuggest "I accidentally restarted the USSR". In this game you will be able to play the tail of Igor Ivanov as he accidentally restarts the USSR.

name: I am Magicami
summary: Action-RPG for your smartphone, released in Japan.

name: I Am 414C
summary: I Am 414C is an engaging text adventure game based on communication with a robot named 414C. There is a challenge for you to overcome - the robot is damaged and has forgotten all the letters. Help 414C to recover its memory by solving binary operations and chat with it to find out about its past and purpose.

name: I Am a Tree. You Are Not. Ha Ha.
summary: Venture from the ocean of piss into a world against you.

name: I Am Not What Remains
summary: she will reach out in horror

name: I Am The Caretaker
summary: You are the caretaker. Today is your first day on the job. Your task is to carefully observe and report all anomalies and deviations. Can you handle this task?

name: I am working
summary: Your work will not love you back

name: I Accidently Insulted a Witch and Now All of My Clothes Are Sentient and They Hate Me!
summary: A strange RPG where you have to go round your room, convincing your clothes to be, well, your clothes again.

name: I Am Alone Too
summary: A horror game about invasion

name: I am queer, am I legit ?
I am Your King
summary: Be a King and rally your countrymen to fight on the field of battle. Build an army and survive as long as you can while defeating the invading enemies, kill points are multiplied by the size of your army at the time of the kill.

name: I am Dog(s)
summary: A queer litle story of discovery, plurality, and therian identity

name: I am Honk
summary: Mr Honk awaits you in his quite thick demeanour in speedy word game!

name: I am dead where are my keys
summary: a halloween space adventure

name: I am on Fire
summary: The flames, the screams, the heat, it was like a nightmare that would never go away, and I woke up to find that I was the only one left in the land, and I went all the way south to get rid of the pain.

name: I Am A I
summary: I AM A I is a cartoony, third-person, open level design, sandbox assassin game. In case that description sounds like some corporate gaming-industry gobbledygook, imagine if Nintendo produced a Hitman game. You play as a small robot that is capable of wielding (as of right now) over 100 unique items and are tasked to assassinate one main target and execute dozens of challenges per level.

name: I Am Gangster
summary: This is a 2D Multiplicity Deck Building, Turn-Based Card Strategy game. I don't think the gaming industry has seen anything quite like this type of genre before. I am the solo developer and want to create the most fun gangster card game I can think of.

name: I Am Butter VR
summary: I AM BUTTER is an adventure story-driven platformer which you will play as a piece of butter and go on adventures in various scenarios, solving puzzles and exploring the unknown. You will encounter a variety of NPCs, talk to them during your adventure. The truth will gradually unfold.

name: I am not legend
summary: A killing time zombie game, the goal is simple, but it is a little difficult and needs some luck. Kill all zombies in the scene, but they double the remaining number every 10 minutes. Do you kill zombies first or find items first? Skill, strategy and luck are important. Can you accept the challenge?

name: I Am 1
summary: You start as 1 single pixel, But that's no fun! As you progress, the game evolves into a 2D side-scrolling action adventure! FIGHT through your foes, level up and upgrade to become more than just 1!

name: I am alive
summary:
The protagonist, Reita, woke up one day in the classroom, and realized that he was all alone.

Feeling completely strange and invaded by a feeling of desolation, he began to walk the corridors of the school. He finds himself there with totally inexplicable things.

name: Iai
summary: This game is about IAI in Japan. (The creator is Japanese). Players are given a signal (!) Press the left click when the The winner is the one who can left-click faster than the enemy.

name: I Am Mouse
summary: I Am Mouse is a game in which the player takes the role of a mouse, which must find food for the family. Hide, run, distract and knock down. Do your best to get food for your family!

name: I am Sakuya: Touhou FPS Game
summary: Dodge bullets, shoot enemies and even stop time as you navigate through 10 beautiful levels in this perfect blend of bullet hell and FPS. Uncover the origins of Sakuya Izayoi's past and investigate the mansion where the scarlet vampires resides in this Touhou Project Fangame!

name: I am Future
summary: I Am Future is a relaxing survival game about building a cozy rooftop camp amid a flooded post-apocalyptic city. Set up a farm, cook delicious food, dismantle tools for crafting resources, automate chores by recruiting cute robots, and uncover the mystery behind the catastrophe.

name: I am Fish
summary: A metroidvania-RPG developed by Taro Kudo and Kazuyuki Kurashima, former Love-de-Lic developers who worked on such titles as moon and Super Mario RPG, exclusively for the DoCoMo i-Mode service.

name: I am Bjorn
summary: You have 1 hour. Start your adventure inside Bjorn’s imprisoned mind. Find your way through his childhood room filled with puzzles and riddles to defeat his lifelong struggles with sight, sound and the past. Pick up and examine almost everything and listen CLOSELY to whats going on in Bjorn's mind.

name: I.A.G. Alpha
summary:
You may think this game is about a post-Soviet Research Institute. About an experiment that went out of control. You may think that the initials "I.A.G." are somehow related to the Institute. You may think this game is unfinished. You may even think that the game ends exactly as the author tells you.

But then you will figure it out—these statements are not entirely true.

name: I am Your Lawyer
summary: I Am Your Lawyer is a game where you play the role of a lawyer. Your task is to represent your clients in court. You have to defend innocent, harmless people and shady guys (murderers, thieves, crooks). See you in court!

name: I Am Die
summary: I Am Die is a physics-based 3D puzzle platformer in which you play as the dice itself, guiding a ball through ramps, tubes, conveyors, and other obstacles. Explore, solve problems, and try not to roll a six!

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4: Airport New Chitose - RJCC
summary:
This product (ATC4: Airport New Chitose [RJCC]) is DLC for "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4".
This DLC includes control of New Chitose Airport and the adjacent Chitose Air Base in Chitose, Hokkaido, Japan.

name: Iaijutsu
summary: In this retro action game, the player controls a mysterious ronin, navigating the rooftops and alleys of a rainy city as they are hunted by a team of elite assassins.

name: I am Sakuya: Touhou FPS Game - Reimu
summary: Continue the adventures from I Am Sakuya with the Reimu expansion pack! Features a whole new character to play as, complete with new weapons, enemies, maps and more!

name: I Am Lewis
summary: A 2D side-scrolling survival game where you play as an ordinary man in extraordinary circumstances. LOOT a beautiful pixel art city, FIGHT sinister monsters, and ESCAPE before it's too late!

name: Iaido
summary: Iaido is a VR First-Person Action Game. The core gameplay is the animate iaido lash simulation. You will fight the enemies with your katana and sheath, Dodge and block the attack of enemies precisely and use iaido slash in the dedicatedly moment is the most fun part of the game.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Haneda - Sky Day! Variety Pack
summary:
You will be able to play five special stages that have a wide variety of aircraft that were in the main game.
You will be able to challenge the stages and search for the best time to take pictures.

name: I am Jesus Christ: Christ's Revenge
summary: Jesus Christ is back... For vengeance. Pray, Fight, and Loot your way to righteous glory. Make your daddy proud and smite all the heretics.

name: I Am the Exorcist
summary: One night, you passed the park, met the miko, and then start an exorcism story with her.

name: I am Sakuya VR: Touhou FPS Game
summary: Now in VR! Dodge bullets, shoot enemies and even stop time as you navigate through 15 beautiful levels in this perfect blend of bullet hell and VR FPS. Uncover the origins of Sakuya Izayoi's past and investigate the mansion where the scarlet vampires resides in this Touhou Project Fangame!

name: I am your President: Prove Yourself Scenario
summary: Immerse yourself in a serious political story and experience how you became president of the USA.

name: I am Rolling
summary: A rage platformer game in which you need to control a ball and avoid obstacles on a mission to... I'm not sure... what is your mission... where are you?

name: I Am Hero: AFK Teamfight
summary: I Am Hero presents unique gameplay with the combination of idle RPG elements with the tactics of auto chess teamfight. Our AFK game lets you build a powerful team to auto fight on your behalf.

name: IAlly
summary: iAlly is a mystery-action game that you can play alone or with 3 friends. Are you ready to feel like a time traveler by solving unique puzzles in a museum full of artifacts from the real world?

name: I am a Caterpillar
summary: Crawl up trees, leap between lily pads, and wriggle through underground caverns as you journey towards your destiny as a caterpillar. Today is the day of your transformation - and you will do anything to stop it.

name: IAssociate
summary:
iAssociate is a word association game where the players goal is to guess which words, or phrases, are associated to each other. At the start of every level you start off with just one word, or phrase, visible, and from that you have to figure out your way through the ever expanding level. For instance, a level might start you off with the word Fruits, from which there would be a number of associations. One of these might be Apple, which in turn could lead to words such as iPhone, Mac, The Big Apple, etc.

iAssociate is a re-brand/re-launch of Mercury Mind, a game released in April 2009.

name: IAssociate 2
summary: The successor to the beloved brain game iAssociate is here with more than a facelift. iAssociate 2 has new kickass features and more challenging levels to drag you in!

name: I am Dave
summary: Is a 3D walking simulator/adventure, where you will go to the office, buy groceries, chat with your colleagues. Live a completely normal life until you start to notice weird stuff and signs from the universe. By the way, who is Dave?

name: I am Rabbit
summary: 3D Flatformer Cute Adventure Rabbit Game Traverse captivating landscapes from forests to cities, seas, skies, and even the moon itself ! Enjoy charming low-polygon graphics ! Overcome challenging traps!

name: I am a Serial Killer
summary:
Martin decided to join a sect called "The Enlightened", who seek to bring to life a mysterious being to eliminate all evil in the world.

How far are you able to go to achieve your goals?

name: Ia Scatter City
summary: Ia Scatter City is a level made with unreal engine and the "ia scatter" add-on where you can fly through a small part of a sci-fi city.

name: I Am Bad at People, but Turns Out I’m Even Worse at Making Games
summary: A conversational Whack-A-Tentacle game.

name: I am OK
summary: Join the talented photography student Neera on a captivating journey through her memories. Haunted by recurring nightmares, her life spirals into chaos, questioning everything. Involuntarily, she returns to a place she once left behind: her childhood home.

name: I am Feeling Things
summary: This tiny bitsy game / visual novel tells the story of Lydia and Ophelia - two lesbians that experience their first date in person, after they have been talking online for a while. The scene takes place in a tiny café, on a rainy day.

name: I Am Short
summary: It's time to step into their tiny little shoes just to see how hard life can be for someone so short.

name: I Am Zombie
summary: This is an RPG game where you will follow our protagonist to fight and save lives!

name: I Am Level
summary:
Flick, bounce, and roll your character through the bizarre yet stylish world of ‘I Am Level’ in this original mix of pinball and platform game.
Tilt your device to get the ball rolling, then tap or hold anywhere on the screen to fire off pinball bumpers, springs, and doors. Clear the screens to unlock more of the map, and level up your player to unlock new costumes.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Haneda - Allstars
Iaidoka_Interlude
summary: A pseudo 8-bit action platformer taking a bit of inspiration from film-noir and samurai dramas, iaidoka_interlude applies a few parkour and fighting game influences to mix up familiarity with a little uniquity.

name: I am a Fish Online
summary: This is a multiplayer online RPG simulation survival game. You can chat casually, socialize and make friends, collect adventures, and obtain various achievements. Become a hero from a small fish. Fight bosses together. Keep your hunger, happiness, sleep, and unlock more fish. Like character, thanks.

name: I Am Reiko
summary: Step into a post-apocalyptic Japan in I Am Reiko, a unique 2D Rogue-Lite adventure. As the world crumbles around her, Reiko not only battles against hostile forces but faces the haunting shadows of personal loss. Every run is a unique experience, filled with a diverse array of weapons and upgrades.

name: I am Lost
summary: Oh, you know, just casually strolling through the job market, and bam! There it was – an advertisement so captivating, I couldn't resist its siren call. It promised a future so bright I'd need sunglasses, and the paycheck? Oh, honey, it was singing a sweet serenade to my bank account. Little did I know, they forgot to spill the beans on the whole shebang! The mystery unraveling is almost as exciting as a surprise birthday party...almost.

name: I am the Law
summary: A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

name: I Ask The Cube Where To Go
summary: This should be simpler than other similar games. I ask it many things just because of my mental state, please don't mind.

name: I Am Kilt
summary: I Am Kilt is a twin-stick shooter roguelite where you fend off endless hordes of enemies. Combine upgrades to overwhelm the opposition and dominate the field. Do you have the forethought and skill to survive?

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4: Airport Nagoya - RJGG
summary:
This product (ATC4: Airport NAGOYA [RJGG]) is DLC for "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4".
This DLC includes control of the Chubu Centrair International Airport in Tokoname, Aichi, Japan.

name: I am Neutron
summary: I am Neutron is a narration and movement based game where you control the character which is a Neutron. You can interact with it by listening to the many unique dialogue it has to say to you.

name: I Am Dog
summary: I Am Dog is a 2D vertical scrolling platformer where you play as Dog! Chomp, stomp and bomb your way through dirt, stone and enemies and reach the bottom of the depths to rescue Dog's friends!

name: I Am Etheric
summary: I Am Etheric is a realistic first-person horror game in which a man with spiritual power visits a small, secluded psychiatric hospital in a town to banish an archon who can travel through different dimensions

name: I am Titan
summary: Destroy the city as a Titan

name: I Am Cat
summary: "I Am Cat" is a VR sandbox adventure game where players step into the role of a cat living in Granny's house. Explore the house, interact with its environments, and complete cat-themed quests. The game offers free-form exploration, physics-based interactions, and mini-games, allowing players to solve puzzles, play games, and create mischief. Whether sneaking around, uncovering secrets, or causing chaos, the choice is yours.

name: I Am Part-time Worker!!
summary: This is an action-comedy game where you work part-time at a convenience store register while taking down troublesome "nuisance customers."

name: I Am Your Beast
summary: I Am Your Beast is a shortform covert revenge thriller FPS about getting hunted across the North American wilderness by the military-industrial complex--and turning the tables.

name: I Am Not Crazy
summary: After losing his daughter and wife, he became depressed and tried to kill himself many times. While she was unconscious, her head hit something hard and she went into a vegetative state. He didn't know where he was. All he wanted was to be reunited with his wife and daughter. He tried everything for her. AND... "Our character is trying to kill himself in a vegetative state."

name: I Am The Registered Environmental Engineer
summary: This world is plagued by pollution, and as an engineer, you need to plan waste routes, gather, sort, and transport it to safe areas. Use powerful equipment to finally clean it up and restore cleanliness to the world.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4: Airport Narita - RJAA
summary:
This product (ATC4: Airport NARITA [RJAA]) is DLC for "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4".
This DLC includes control of Narita International Airport in Narita, Chiba, Japan.

name: I am Sorry
summary: "I am Sorry" is a game where you investigate objects and solve puzzles to uncover the story. Become a janitor, clean the house, and uncover the hidden truths of the story.

name: I Am Giraffe
summary:
In a sunny merry meadow village, where a herd of giraffes live in peace and innocuously enough. something unusual has happened...a giraffe was born mutant.

He goes on the process of evolution, in his very peculiar way, by knocking out other giraffe brothers and “absorbing” them.

name: I Am Security
summary: Step into the shoes of a club security guard in "I Am Security," where your job is to keep the club safe and ensure only the right guests get inside. As a security guard, you’ll face a variety of challenges that will test your observation and decision-making skills.

name: I Am Legion: Stand Survivors
summary: Summon your stands and brawl it out! Dive into the thrill of mowing down enemies, synthesizing and upgrading, mining, forging gear, unlocking new characters and equipment. Discover unique stands combos and craft your own battle style to break through the chaos!

name: I Am a Worm
summary: Oh, to be a worm, in a dream, trying to find an exit to get out. After all, can you imagine not having the arms for forks or spoons?! A short, worm-themed platformer.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero - Centrair 20th Anniversary
summary: Centrair 20th Anniversary! Tackle the toughest aviation puzzles with the special 'I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero' game, in collaboration with Centrair!

name: I Am Here, I Won't Disappear. I Am Here, I Won't...
summary: A black-white-and-red visual novel about a girl afraid of disappearing. And a bit about her cat.

name: I Am Feeling Things Too
summary: This game tells the story of Lydia and Ophelia - two lesbians who experience their first date in person, after they have been talking online for a while. The scene takes place in Ophelia's place, after having had a date on a café in i am feeling things.

name: I Am Your Beast: Support Group Update
summary: The new story expansion sees a new epilogue added to the end of the game where you’ll sit in as a part of the COI Support Group. Tall tales are swapped across nine levels, with ten new cutscenes and extreme situations for Harding to force his opponents through that you don't typically experience in the main game.

name: I Am Your Beast: Cold Sweat Update
summary: Our final content update, Cold Sweat, is out now! This update brings new story-free levels that up the challenge and extend the weird. It also features a remix of TYRANTS BETTER RUN by Mega Ran, so yeah, we’re pretty excited about this one!

name: I Am Butter
summary: Imagine you are incarnated as a small piece of butter in common scenes such as kitchens and fast food restaurants，use your cleverness and endurance to jump to the end step by step! The bottles and cans that can be taken easily at ordinary times have become inaccessible mountains in front of you!

name: I Am Immortal Here
summary: Only I exist here. It's the world of freedom. Nothing restricts you in this place.

name: I Am Busy Digging a Hole
summary: A relaxing digging simulator where you explore colorful underground worlds. Dig deeper, find valuable ores, upgrade your equipment, and collect rare dragons. The deeper you go, the more treasures and mysteries you'll discover.

name: I Am Ripper
summary:
A British Thriller set in the brutality and economic decline of the 1980's. You are a forensic investigator called on to solve one of the UK's most prolific crimes.

Step into the world of Ripper.

It's 1988, a small north-western dock town in Britain has witnessed multiple victims by a single killer who have been confirmed through forensic analysis.
Throughout the game, you will be faced with critical decisions which will change the outcome of your investigation.
You must confront a series of gut-wrenching challenges placing the fates of others in your hands.
Find the forensics, reveal the secrets and pursue the person responsible.

name: I Am Reptile
summary: In this 2D action platformer, you'll play as a humanoid reptile and save the planet and your people from an evil corporation! Reach the control center and activate the self-destruct mechanism! It won't be easy, as there are plenty of traps, obstacles, and heavily armed guards in your way!

name: I Am Night
summary: A folk horror roguelike deckbuilder where you tear apart and scrap together cards to face monsters, unravel mysteries, and survive a world forged in fear. Set out on a brave, twisted adventure of self-discovery.

name: I Am a Dorm Resident (but Cat)
summary: This is the corridor of a student dormitory with a hundred-year history… and you find yourself sleeping in it. You awaken as a cat, your memories lost. Paws in place of hands, fur covering your face — the only thing you remember is that you were once a resident here. But fortunately, the one you’ve transformed into is ‘Bon’, the dorm cat loved by everyone. Stroll through the corridors, chat with the dorm residents, receive treats, run errands, and when you’re tired, curl up for a nap under the kotatsu. While enjoying this carefree moratorium that only a cat can enjoy, search for the secrets hidden within the dorm and the memories you’ve lost.f

name: I Am A Stick
summary: Advance, fall, suffer, repeat. You're a stick with something to prove.

name: IAI
summary: I AI is a VR-only multiplayer puzzle game for two players. Communicate, cooperate, and solve challenges together to uncover a fractured sci-fi story shaped by the memories of the Dreamers.

name: I Am Going for a Beer
summary: You're just an ordinary guy, coming home after a long day. Beer in hand, TV on... but suddenly it runs out. Time to leave your cozy apartment, go down the stairs, cross the street, and get to the supermarket to find the best beer in the world. But isn’t this a strange dream? When will it end?

name: I am a Princess from Another World
I Am You, I Am Everything.
summary: Who are You? What does it mean to be You?

name: I Am The Landlord
summary: If you had a plot of land, what would you build on it? In "I Am The Landlord," you'll play as a landlord who owns an apartment building in the city center, starting from an empty plot and using your design skills and creativity to construct unique apartments.

name: I am a Senior Official
summary: One of the features of the game is to let you experience the feeling of being an official. As a local official, when faced with the temptation of power and money, it is up to you to decide whether to abide by yourself or be corrupt.

name: I Am Quadrober!
summary: Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the best quadrober? Join us and prove that you are a true master of quadrobbing!

name: I Am Sakuya FPS: Lunarian Invasion
summary: Fight through cute enemies and tough bosses alike using your diverse arsenal of weapons and your ability to stop time! Get revenge on those Lunarians as you uncover their secret bases through 10 beautiful levels in this fully 3D FPS game based on the Touhou Project!

name: I am Machine
summary: Fight through a machine-ruled world in this isometric rogue-lite adventure. As Erik, a man-turned-robot, outsmart waves of enemies and adapt to ever-changing levels. Change the world before it changes you in this relentless quest for vengeance.

name: IAH: Internet War
summary: "IAH: INTERNET WAR" - a roguelike Turn-Based RTS hybrid survival game. Battle through the internet’s depths and survive as long as possible.

name: I Am Monkey
summary:
I Am Monkey, a VR experience that puts you in the skin of a zoo monkey. Human visitors come and go — some smile, wave, and offer bananas, while others mock, tease, or try to provoke the little monkey.

Every visitor is unique. Charm the guests and grab their gifts, or fight back against their cruelty.

name: I Am Very Good At Walking
summary: A competitive walking third person jumping platformer. Indie. Maybe kind of frustrating.

name: Iago
summary:
Iago teaches Japanese language and culture through common situations and a visual novel story with funny characters, such as SephirothSword57, Sanic the Hedgehog, Akatsuki from Akatsuki Blitzkampf, and more. The game contains tips about cultural nuances, spaced repetition system practice, and conversation simulation.

The reader takes the role of a nameless girl who has just moved to Osaka, Japan, where she meets the girl Iako-chan and her pet bird Iago. The two help her get used to speaking in Japan.

If the player begins the story from zero Japanese knowledge, they will learn kana and other fundamentals through solving a locked-room murder mystery.

As the player progresses, they receive coins they can use to unlock stamps, which each has a unique design and description about a real location in Japan.

name: I Am Bird
summary:
I Am Bird puts you in the wings of a true bird hero. Fly freely through
a large city full of quests, activities, and exploration. Experience the
life of a super-bird from above as you glide through streets, rooftops,
and open skies.
